Hello and welcome to the <#1042217838884171816> channel <:nfteth:822186186016948314> 

Feel free to reach out to the Biconomy Team at any point with your questions!


üëÄ **ABOUT** 
**Biconomy** is a Web3 developer platform that empowers blockchain developers to build without limits, so we can all easily access and benefit from a decentralised future.

We power meta-transactions at scale with a non-custodial, multi-chain, and gas efficient relayer infrastructure network.

Since Nov 2022, we‚Äôve launched a powerful and hyper-flexible SDK that lets developers build effortlessly while keeping things simple for end users.

Integration with the SDK takes only minutes, and allows easy plugging, stacking, and customisation of APIs and modules that result in one-click user journeys, transaction bundling, and control over gas fees.

Ôªøhttps://biconomy.io


üèÜ **PRIZE OVERVIEW **

ü•á Top Prize - $3000 - Best Module on Biconomy SDK
ü•à Second Prize - $2000 - Best Transaction Batch using Biconomy SDK
üèä‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Prize Pool - $5000 - Biconomy will grant $250 to dApps that integrate the Biconomy SDK, uses the smart contract wallets to build offer UX flows, and has a working demo/dapp (max 20 projects).

**‚Üì Full Prize Breakdown Here ‚Üì **
https://ethglobal.com/events/ethindia2022/prizes

Hey folks, After doing Social Login is there any auth token that is available ? need something to make API calls on behalf of the user
User Info
Hey, auth token is not exposed via our sdk. Hence, you wouldn't be able to make API calls on behalf of the user
@here Checkout these examples on integrating the SDK: https://github.com/bcnmy/sdk-examples

I'm currently trying to create an account in biconomy. And it is asking for a  website URL while signing up.  How do we skip that portion as currently our project is being built and it is not deployed.

The relayers are not sending enough gas
https://goerli.etherscan.io/tx/0x87634d59cc211bd030c849cfbb142222c296e5b1d3d080119414bf9a8498767c

Can someone take a look?

Loved using Biconomy this hackathon and the different features of the SDK seemed really relevant and cool, would love to work with ya guys

I had a query, if anyone could assist, suppose there is an EOA with 0.1 ETH and the user wants to transfer the entirety to a contract. Can we do this using meta txns and biconomy? like the updated contract balance would be 0.1 ETH and that of EOA would be 0, gas would be paid from gas tanks
for native token transfers meta transactions are not supported. you could do this for some erc20 tokens on mainnet and most erc20 tokens on polygon
I was made aware of that, was wondering if there was some hack or workaround that could be done.

Hello and welcome to the <#1042217838884171816> channel <:nfteth:822186186016948314>

Feel free to reach out to the Biconomy Team at any point with your questions!

üëÄ **ABOUT**
**Biconomy** is a Web3 developer and transaction infrastructure platform that helps developers build effortless experiences for their end users.

As pioneers of Account Abstraction (ERC-4337) and Gasless transactions, we accelerate the mass adoption of Web3 through simplified UX, achieved with a powerful decentralised UX stack. 

Developers use our Account Abstraction-compliant SDK to easily remove UX complexities, onboard users, and scale their dApps.


üèÜ **PRIZE OVERVIEW**

Hello,
I am hacking in EthParis and I would like to know if there is some example to configure the Paymaster to pay for EOA wallet (in the FullStack Tutorial is only for smart account) ?

Hey! Unfortunately this is not possible with the 4337 approach as this requires a smart contract wallet 

Our eoa gasless solution requires using 2771 meta transactions approach
